title: ADCs should not be able to drain tank you to death while dealing a shitton of damage
body:
Things like {{item:3812}}  and {{item:3046}} are terrible game design and should not be standard items on a class that's supposed to be squishy.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
